ComicInfo.Summary:
Darkness-bearer Jackie Estacado slips off to Alaska, land of the midnight sun, to escape the all-encompassing darkness. But his trip takes a sour turn when Jackie is confronted by a soul even more tortured than his own...and more powerful. With no darkness to sustain him, how can Jackie face...the Reckoning?
